pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, July 21, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Thursday, July 21, 2016:

Ottawa, Ontario

11:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will announce Canadaâ€™s 2016 Rio Olympics Flag Bearer with the Minister of Sport and Persons with Disabilities, Carla Qualtrough, and the Canadian Olympic Committee President, Tricia Smith.

Front Lawn, Parliament Hill
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Open media coverage
  • Journalists who are not members of the Canadian Parliamentary Press Gallery will require accreditation from the gallery in advance. For more information, contact Collin Lafrance at collin.lafrance@parl.gc.ca.


Media Appearances

Between 9:00 a.m. and 9:30 a.m. A brief interview with the Prime Minister will be broadcast on Global Morning News


PMO Media Relations:
media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
